Package DAO

Class ProductDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.ProductDAO
public class ProductDAO extends Object
This Class is used to Add, delete,retrieve and update information of products from database

      Adds a new product to the database.
      Parameters:

      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

    • getLowQuantityProducts

      public static List<Product> getLowQuantityProducts()
      Retrieves products with a low quantity (less than or equal to 50) from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Product objects with low quantities
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

      Deletes a product from the database based on the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to be deleted
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

    • deleteSoldProducts

      public static void deleteSoldProducts()
      Deletes products with zero total quantity from the database.

      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

      Updates product details in the database.
      Parameters:
      p - The Product object with updated details

      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

    • updateProductQuantity

      public static void updateProductQuantity(int totalPacks, int total, int pid)
      Updates product quantity details in the database.
      Parameters:
      totalPacks - The updated total packs
      total - The updated total quantity
      pid - The ID of the product to be updated
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

    • checkID

      public static boolean checkID(int cid)
      Checks if a product ID exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      cid - The ID of the product to check
      Returns:
      true if the ID exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

    • getAllProducts

      public static List<Product> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products from the database.
      Returns:
      A list containing all Product objects retrieved from the database
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

    • getProductsByName

      public static List<Product> getProductsByName(String productName)
      Retrieves products by name from the database.
      Parameters:
      productName - The name of the product or a partial name to search for
      Returns:
      A list containing Product objects with names similar to the provided name
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

    • getProductsByCategoryAndSubcategories

      public static List<Product> getProductsByCategoryAndSubcategories(String categoryName)
      Retrieves products from a specific category and its subcategories.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - The name or part of the name of the category
      Returns:
      A list of products belonging to the specified category and its subcategories
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

    • moveExpiredProducts

      public static void moveExpiredProducts()
      Moves expired products from the product table to the expired_products table in the database. Deletes the expired products from the product table.

    • getAllExpiredProducts

      public static List<Product> getAllExpiredProducts()
      Retrieves all expired products from the 'expired_products' table.
      Returns:
      A list of all expired products

    • getProductsNearExpiry

      public static List<Product> getProductsNearExpiry()
      Retrieves products that are near their expiry date within the next 15 days.
      Returns:
      A list of products near their expiry date
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

    • getProductsByCategoryNearToExpiry

      public static List<Product> getProductsByCategoryNearToExpiry(String categoryName)
      Retrieves products from a specific category and its subcategories that are near expiry within the next 15 days.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - The name or part of the name of the category
      Returns:
      A list of products near expiry from the specified category and its subcategories
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an issue executing the SQL query

      Returns:
